quotes.quote: Calamities are of two kinds: misfortunes to ourselves, and good fortune to others.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: We should manage our fortunes as we do our health - enjoy it when good, be patient when it is bad, and never apply violent remedies except in an extreme necessity.
quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Behind every great fortune there is a crime.
quotes.author: Honore de Balzac

quotes.quote: Many men can make a fortune but very few can build a family.
quotes.author: J. S. Bryan

quotes.quote:
Fortune can, for her pleasure, fools advance,
And toss them on the wheels of Chance.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Depend not on fortune, but on conduct.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Nature magically suits a man to his fortunes, by making them the fruit of his character.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Every man is the architect of his own fortune.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: Of all human ills, greatest is fortune's wayward tyranny.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Fortune does not change men, it unmasks them.
quotes.author: Suzanne Necker

quotes.quote: Henceforth I ask not good fortune. I myself am good fortune.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman
